comment.text: This translation key is used to display the label for a toggle switch that enables Single Sign-on authentication. It appears in the UI as a settings category title and is intended to be displayed when the feature is not available. Translators should ensure the text accurately conveys the intent of enabling SSO, while also considering the context in which it will be used.

usage.context:
fontWeight={600}
 lineHeight="20px"
 noSelect
 className="settings_unavailable"
 >
 {t("TurnOnSSO")}
 </Text>
 {!isSSOAvailable ? (
 <Badge
 backgroundColor={
 theme.isBase

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Birdəfəlik Girişli Doğrulamanı aktivləşdirin' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the 'activation' of SSO.
While technically correct, 'Birdəfəlik' can be simplified. It is preferred 'Tək' in this context.
While technically correct, "Povolení jednotného přihlašovacího ověřování" is a very literal and somewhat clunky translation. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možnosti: 'Povolit jednotné přihlašování', 'Zapnout jednotné přihlašování', 'Aktivovat jednotné přihlašování'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Habilitar la autenticación de inicio de sesión único' is a literal translation and not the most natural or idiomatic way to say 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication' in Spanish. 'Inicio de sesión único' is a very direct translation of 'Single Sign-on' and less commonly used. A more natural phrasing would be 'Habilitar la autenticación de inicio de sesión único' or 'Activar la autenticación de inicio de sesión único'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Habilitar la autenticación de inicio de sesión único

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Salli vahvistaminen yhdellä sisäänkirjautumisella' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Finnish. A more idiomatic translation for 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication' would be more easily understood.

The translation 'Միացնել մեկանգամյա մուտքգործման իսկորոշումը' is not a precise translation of 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication'. While it conveys a similar meaning, 'իսկորոշումը' (decision/setting) isn't the most natural choice.  'Միացնել մեկանգամյա մուտքի համակարգը' or 'Միացնել մեկանգամյա մուտքի գործունեությունը' would be more accurate.
The word 'ການ' is often redundant in Lao and can be removed to improve readability. While not strictly incorrect, it makes the sentence feel a bit verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດໃຊ້ການພິສູດຢືນຢັນການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດຽວ -> ເປີດໃຊ້ພິສູດຢືນຢັນການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດຽວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Iespējot vienotās pierakstīšanās autentifikāciju' is a very literal translation and sounds unnatural in Latvian. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ieteicams apsvērt alternatīvu tulkojumu, piemēram: 'Aktivizēt vienoto pieteikšanos' vai 'Iestatīt vienotu pieteikšanos'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Single Sign-on Verificatie inschakelen' while understandable, isn't the most natural phrasing in Dutch. 'Verificatie' is a more technical term. A more user-friendly translation for 'Authentication' would be 'Authenticatie' or 'Inloggen'.

The translation 'Permitir o Início de Sessão Único' is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication' in a natural and user-friendly way in Portuguese. While technically correct, it sounds clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ativar Autenticação por Sign-in Único' or 'Habilitar Sign-in Único' for a more natural and common phrasing.  'Ativar' or 'Habilitar' are better equivalents for 'Enable' in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'logon único' is not the most common or natural way to express 'Single Sign-on' in Brazilian Portuguese. 'Autenticação de único sign-in' or 'Autenticação de acesso único' would be more standard and clearer.

While technically correct, 'Activare autentificare unică (SSO)' is a bit literal. A more natural Romanian phrasing for 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication' would be 'Permite autentificarea unică (SSO)' or 'Activează autentificarea unică (SSO)'.

The translation "Включить аутентификацию с помощью технологии единого входа" is a bit literal and verbose. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing in Russian. 'Единого входа' is a slightly clunky way to refer to Single Sign-On.
The translation uses a full sentence structure which may be too formal for a UI label. A shorter, more concise option would be preferable.

The translation 'තනි පිවිසුම සබල කරන්න' while conveying the general idea of 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication', isn't the most natural or precise phrasing in Sinhala.  'තනි පිවිසුම' translates to 'Single Access' which is close but not exact. A more accurate translation would incorporate the 'Authentication' aspect. The word 'sabal' means 'enable', and that part is accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තනි ලාගිනය කිරීම් සබල කරන්න (Tani Lagoonium Kimik Savala Kanna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "preverjanje pristnosti enkratne prijave" is a very literal and somewhat clunky translation. A more natural Slovenian phrasing would be more easily understood by the user.
The term "enkratne prijave" (single sign-on) can be perceived as too technical for a general user. A simpler, more user-friendly translation is preferable.
The English term 'Single Sign-on' is included in parentheses after the Serbian translation. While understandable, it's less elegant and may disrupt the flow. Consider integrating it more seamlessly.

The translation 'Omogući jednokratnu prijavu (Single Sign-on) autentifikaciju' is overly literal and not the most natural phrasing in Serbian.  'Jednokratnu prijavu' directly translates to 'single login,' which isn't ideal. The term 'Single Sign-on' in parentheses is redundant since it's already explained.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogući prijavu preko jedinstvenog sistema autentifikacije

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parenthetical inclusion of '(Single Sign-on)' is unnecessary and disrupts the flow of the Serbian text.

The translation 'Увімкнути автентифікацію єдиного входу' is a literal translation of 'Enable Single Sign-on Authentication'. While technically correct, it's not the most natural or user-friendly way to express this in Ukrainian. A more idiomatic translation would improve clarity and user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розширити можливості входу через єдиний обліковий запис

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'єдиного входу' (single entry) is a less common way to refer to 'single sign-on' in Ukrainian. It can be confusing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розширити можливості входу за допомогою єдиного облікового запису

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation "Thuật toán giải mã mặc định" translates to "Default decoding algorithm". This is not an accurate translation of "Enable Single Sign-on Authentication".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "Bật xác thực Đăng nhập một lần" or "Kích hoạt xác thực Đăng nhập một lần".
